name: Elder Tower
description:
Elder Tower is an Eldritch themed top-down shooter and tower defence hybrid game with an art style that is inspired by hand-held games pixel art mainly the game advanced era of games. 

Controls

WSAD or Arrows Keys to move

R is to reload

Aim with mouse

Left mouse button to fire the gun

Q to create Towers (25 coins is required)

Left mouse click again to place tower when tower bp is white

Right Mouse button to cancel building tower

What can you do so far?

Collet money and bullets! Shoot a gun and reload that gun *whoa* aim the gun to kill the octopus monsters and create weird towers to help kill them to prevent them from ending the game 

The game is currently unfinished and .............missing features

Planned Features

-enemy variation

-enemies hostile to the player

-dying :O

-working menu

-saving and loading

-shops to upgrade the gun or towers and even buy new guns and towers.

-Final "epic" boss
